bib.title: Open Stylometric System WebSty: Towards Multilingual and Multipurpose Workbench
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej and Walkowiak, Tomasz and Eder, Maciej
bib.abstract: WebSty is an open, web-based stylometric system designed for Social Sciences & Humanities (SS&H) users. It was designed according to the CLARIN philosophy: no need for installation, minimised requirements on the users' technical skills and knowledge, and focus on SS&H tasks. In the paper, we present its latest extension with several visualisation methods, techniques for the extraction of characteristic features, and support for multilinguality.
bib.booktitle: Selected papers from the CLARIN Annual Conference 2017, Budapest, 18--20 September 2017
